body_html:
@byronyi

One is limited to AllReduce over MPI, but has a different approach to MPI integration: baidu-research/tensorflow-allreduce#2

The other one is not yet a PR, but probably will generate one. It bypasses MPI and gets TF to work directly on verbs: https://github.com/yahoo/tensorflow/tree/22fd3aad2dac96d521b5224519f443cef5269efb/tensorflow
